Rotati Payment Solutions is a new online payment gateway for Cambodia and the world!

Rotati Payment Solutions is part of a group of payment companies handles more than $50 billion in transaction value a year so yours in good company. Our group members include Beanstream, Euroline, Keycorp, dSAFE, Samport, IP Payments, MPS, DK Online and ePay.

Rotati Payment Solutions for e-commerce

Whether you need to design and deploy a new business-to-business or business-to-consumer e-commerce strategy or enhance the one you already have, Rotati Payment Solutions can help add value to your e-commerce implementation.

Flexible Payment Options

Rotati Payment Solutions provides serveral popular payment methods for your specific needs and we accept most major payment types.

Batch Payment Processing

Rotati Payment Solutions can process multiple payments at once with batch payments.

Recurring Billing

Speed up billing operations without losing attention to detail than track and download reports every step of the way. Rotati's recurring billing gives you the flexibility to customize the intervals when your customers are charged. Set the schedule that works for your business, whether it’s weekly, monthly, semi-annually, or any other schedule you choose, declined transactions and send your customers beautiful and clear invoice.

Security Is Priority

Rotati works hard to ensure your transactions are secure and fraudulent free through tokenization and sophisticated fraud tools.
